title: Emergency Safety Alert Platform with Dual Authentication and Real-Time Response

requirements.text: Create a landing page with a compelling safety-focused caption and a prominent 'Check Here for Safety' button that serves as the entry point to the emergency alert system

quotes: on starting page best caption will need after that button will need to press

acceptanceCriteria: Landing page displays an impactful safety message
Prominent 'Check Here for Safety' button is clearly visible
Button leads to the emergency alert flow

requirements.text: Implement dual authentication system with separate sign-up and sign-in flows for two user types: 'People' (citizens) and 'Officer' (police)

quotes: for people sign up as people ,and for police sign up as officer
There I need two types of login one for people and another one for police

acceptanceCriteria: Sign-up page allows users to select their role: 'People' or 'Officer'
Separate registration flows for citizens and police officers
Sign-in page authenticates users based on their registered role
User role is stored and validated on backend

requirements.text: Create user registration form that collects name and mobile number for both citizen and officer sign-ups

quotes: after page they need to enter their names and mobile number

acceptanceCriteria: Registration form includes name input field
Registration form includes mobile number input field
Form validates mobile number format
User data is stored securely in backend

requirements.text: Implement location access request with clear permission messaging that asks 'Allow location access to check where you are' when a citizen initiates an emergency alert

quotes: after there they need to on location ,there in their mobile one notification will come on allow location access to check where u are like that

acceptanceCriteria: Browser prompts for location permission when user initiates alert
Clear message explains why location access is needed
Location permission state is tracked
Fallback message if location is denied

requirements.text: Capture and transmit the citizen's exact live location to the nearest police station when they send a help request

quotes: there that person exact location will be sent to near cops or police station

acceptanceCriteria: System captures GPS coordinates when help request is sent
Location data is transmitted to backend
Backend identifies nearest police station or officers
Help request includes accurate location coordinates

requirements.text: Build a police officer dashboard that receives emergency help requests from citizens, displays their location, name, and mobile number, and allows officers to accept requests

quotes: Near police station people or station will receive the request and accept
After getting msg to police they need to respond quickly

acceptanceCriteria: Police dashboard shows incoming help requests in real-time
Each request displays citizen name, mobile number, and location
Officers can accept help requests
Dashboard updates when requests are accepted or resolved

requirements.text: Implement real-time notification system that alerts police officers when a new help request is received and notifies citizens when their request is accepted

quotes: If they will send message or do call quick response I need

acceptanceCriteria: Police officers receive browser notifications for new help requests
Citizens receive notification when officer accepts their request
Notifications include essential alert information
Notification permissions are requested appropriately

requirements.text: Add in-app calling functionality that enables police officers to directly call the citizen's mobile number from the help request interface

quotes: after police will receive the help request they need to call the person

acceptanceCriteria: Help request displays clickable phone number for officers
Clicking phone number initiates a call on the officer's device
Call button is prominently displayed on request details

requirements.text: Implement a messaging system that allows quick communication between citizens and responding officers

quotes: Messaging system for quick communication between citizens and police

acceptanceCriteria: Citizens can send text messages to responding officers
Officers can reply to citizen messages
Messages are delivered in real-time
Message history is preserved for each help request

requirements.text: Display quick response indicators and status updates showing when police have received, accepted, and are responding to emergency requests

quotes: after sending the details they need to do quick respond and they need to come
Quick response indicators and status updates for emergency requests

acceptanceCriteria: Help request shows status: Sent, Received, Accepted, Responding
Citizens see real-time status updates on their request
Officers can update status as they respond
Status changes trigger notifications

requirements.text: Apply a professional, trustworthy visual design with an urgent yet calming aesthetic suitable for an emergency response platform, using colors that convey safety and reliability, clear typography for readability under stress, and intuitive layouts that prioritize speed and clarity
acceptanceCriteria: Design uses colors associated with emergency services and safety
Typography is highly legible for quick reading
Layout prioritizes critical actions and information
Visual hierarchy guides users through emergency workflows efficiently

constraints: Location tracking must work accurately on mobile devices
System must handle real-time data updates for help requests
User authentication must distinguish between citizen and officer roles
Emergency alerts must be delivered with minimal latency
nonGoals: Integration with actual emergency services dispatch systems

required: Emergency alert icon for the main action button, red and white color scheme (emergency-icon.dim_128x128.png)
Police badge icon for officer authentication section (police-badge.dim_96x96.png)
Location pin icon for displaying help request locations (location-pin.dim_64x64.png)
Safety shield logo for landing page header (safety-shield.dim_256x256.png)
